song.englishname: Some Will Seek Forgiveness, Others Escape

english.segment1: I heard a voice through the discord. A deluge of passersby. I saw one gaze frozen in time. Watching me passing by
english.segment2: I swear I'll know your face in the crowd. And I'll hear your voice so loud. When you're whispering
english.segment3: Hey unfaithful I will teach you. To be stronger. Hey ungraceful I will teach you. To forgive one another
english.segment4: Here's my kiss to betray. Desperate to brush the lips of grace. Do you feel hollow when you think of how I lied?
english.segment5: Oh sweet angel of mercy. With your grace like the morning. Wrap your loving arms around me. Oh sweet angel of mercy. With your grace like the morning. Wrap your loving arms around me
english.segment6: Hey unfaithful I will teach you. To be stronger. Hey ungraceful I will teach you. To forgive one another
english.segment7: Hey unfaithful I will teach you. To be stronger. Hey unloving. I will love you. And will love you
english.segment8: Jesus I'm ready to come home. I'm ready to come. Jesus I'm ready to come home. Unfaithful. Ungraceful. And unloving. I will love you
